Paragraph: Left atrial and left ventricular papillary muscle contractile responses to isoproterenol were reduced compared to controls in groups treated with clentiazem alone , but combined with epinephrine , clentiazem restored left atrial responses and enhanced left ventricular papillary responses to isoproterenol .

The paragraph does not mention any disease entities. The words "left atrial" and "left ventricular" refer to parts of the heart, and "papillary muscle" refers to a specific type of muscle tissue found in the heart. The paragraph describes the effects of certain drugs on the contractile responses of these tissues, but it does not mention any diseases.
